testcase.name: addTodoWhenTitleAndDescriptionAreTooLong

error.message: Request processing failed; nested exception is org.springframework.jdbc.BadSqlGrammarException: PreparedStatementCallback; bad SQL grammar [SELECT PAYMENTS.PAYMENT as TYPE, SUM(PAYMENTS.TOTAL) as TOTAL, COUNT(PAYMENTS.ID) as NUMBER FROM PAYMENTS JOIN RECEIPTS ON PAYMENTS.RECEIPT = RECEIPTS.ID WHERE RECEIPTS.MONEY = ? WHERE CLOSEDCASH.DATEEND IS NULL GROUP BY PAYMENTS.PAYMENT]; nested exception is com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'WHERE CLOSEDCASH.DATEEND IS NULL GROUP BY PAYMENTS.PAYMENT' at line 1
